low.title: close-minded
description: You may be perceived as dogmatic and closed-minded

high.title: open-minded
description: You're more willing to try new things
You're creative and curious of new things
You're generally more aware of your feelings
You're more likely to hold unconventional beliefs
You're more likely to be unpredictable and engage in risky behaviour

low.title: disorganised
description: You're flexible and spontaneous but can sometimes appear unreliabile
You're not stobborn and are more compliant

high.title: organised
description: You have a preference to plan things rather than being spontaneous
You have a tendency to display self-discipline, act dutifully, and strive for achievement against measures or outside expectations
You're more stubborn and pay attention to detail
You finish important tasks right away
